Texts.Chs: 恐怖来自多种形式的黑暗。这种致命武器是你应该害怕的东西之一。向他祷告，并把祭品放在祭坛上面：一个远古残卷，一个沃尔坦核心和一个未知能量核心。
Texts.Eng: Terror comes from the dark one in many forms. This deadly weapon is one of the things you ought to fear. Pray to Him and place upon the altar the following: Elder Artifact x 1 , Valtan Casing x 1, Unknown Reactor x1
